parameters.name: RefList
parameters.description: Array of IRefPlane s, ISurface s, and/or IFace2 s that intersect with parameter faces

title: IPrimaryMemberFacePlaneIntersectionFeatureData.SetIntersectingPlanesAndFaces
description: Sets the planes, surfaces, and faces that intersect with parameter faces of this structure system member.

parameters.name: RefList
parameters.description: Array of IRefPlane s, ISurface s, and/or IFace2 s that intersect with parameter faces

returns: True if intersecting objects successfully set, false if not
remarks:
Entities passed should intersect with at least one entity returned by
IPrimaryMemberFacePlaneIntersectionFeatureData::GetParameterFaces
.
At edit time, you can set only one intersecting entity.
